XinxAction::Action

XinxAction::Action Class Reference

This class represent an action in XINX This class is a wrapper of a Qt action QAction. This wrapper is used to facilite the enable, and visible feature of the action. More...

#include <actioninterface.h>

Inherits XinxAction::MenuItem.

virtual void actionTriggered ()
 Get the current editor (or not) and trigger the action.

Detailed Description

This class represent an action in XINX This class is a wrapper of a Qt action QAction. This wrapper is used to facilite the enable, and visible feature of the action.
